article: Today is Saturday, Lisa doesn't go to school. She goes to Center Zoo  _  her sister Sally. The zoo is not near their house.  _ they go there by bus. At about eight thirty, they get to the zoo. In the zoo, they see lots of interesting  _ . At eleven thirty, they feel kind of  _ . They have lunch in a small restaurant near the zoo. After  _ , they go to the supermarket. Sally wants to  _ some bananas for her grandfather. Near the supermarket they  _ a little girl crying . She tells them she can't _ her mother. Lisa is very  _ . She talks with the girl and knows her mother's  telephone  number. Then Lisa calls her mother. Two minutes later, her mother arrives. This girl is very happy to see her mother.Of course, Lisa and Sally are very happy,too.
